org.happy.artist.rmdmia.rcsm.providers.ros.client.transport.udpros
Class UDPReceiver

java.lang.Object
  org.happy.artist.rmdmia.rcsm.providers.ros.client.transport.udpros.UDPReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, CommunicationReceiverInterface
public class UDPReceiver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, CommunicationReceiverInterface

UDPReceiver.java UDPReceiver for specified UDP server, port number & packet length. Must call initialize() after construction is completed, and before the Runnable start() method. Each UDPROS Listener Port should use this class.

                       java.lang.InstantiationException,
                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException
In UDP Pass in the DatagramSocket to the Receiver rather than instantiate a second, because an instance in the Sender and Receiver will cause a Bind Exception saying address already in use.

java.net.SocketException
